Name: Cato, the cat
About the game: Cato, the cat is a casual match-3 game where you have to take care of your pet. You have to take care of Cato, a very smart cat, through a match-3 mechanic, don't let him get away, for that you'll have to feed him, quench his thirst and give him lots of love and fun. How to play Select a piece, you can use the spacebar key to rotate the piece, then place it on the board. Match 3 pieces or more of the same type horizontally or vertically ENJOY!
